answers.answer: HiGet yourself to  a Doctor as soon as you can get it checked out...GodBless....Bob
I'm thinking its diabetes it runs in both sides of the family and I'm getting to the age that my family started showing signs. Thank you for your prayers I will go as soon as my carecard gets in.

question: I have had these red spots for a little bit. They started as small spots about the size of a pin ***** and over a year they have turned into spots. Now they are slowly going up my leg.
title: red dots on my feet turned into spots and now slowly going up my leg
